text: Proteus-like syndrome (PLS) is a condition similar to Proteus syndrome, but with an uncertain cause. ==See also== *List of cutaneous conditions *PTEN (gene) *Multiple hamartoma syndrome ==References== == External links == * GeneReviews/NCBI/NIH/UW entry on PTEN Hamartoma Tumor Syndrome (PHTS) Category:Deficiencies of intracellular signaling peptides and proteins Category:Genodermatoses Category:Syndromes
title: Proteus-like syndrome
